meanings.definition: A connection or series of connections linking two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The nexuses between the different parts of the machine ensure smooth operation.
meanings.sent2: The nexuses of the internet allow us to communicate instantly across the globe.
meanings.sent3: The nexuses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as the nexuses that brought the community together.
meanings.sent5: The nexuses of friendship are like invisible threads that bind us.

meanings.definition: A central or most important point.
meanings.sent1: The nexuses of the argument were finally addressed in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The nexuses of the story revealed the true intentions of the main character.
meanings.sent3: The nexuses of the movie plot kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: His speech hit the nexuses of our emotions, leaving us deeply moved.
meanings.sent5: The nexuses of the problem became clear after thorough analysis.
